titleStmt.title: By the Queene. Whereas an vntrue and slaunderous reporte hath of late beene raysed by some euill disposed and malicious persons against the Lord Mayor of this cittie, as if by his meanes the price of graine that beganne to fall should be enhaunced to an higher rate ...
Proclamations. 1597-09-15
titleStmt.author: England and Wales. Sovereign (1558-1603 : Elizabeth I)
Elizabeth I, Queen of England, 1533-1603.

publicationStmt.publisher: By the deputies of Christopher Barker, printer to the Queenes most excellent Maiestie,

notesStmt.note: Against slanderous reports that the Lord Mayor of London has engrossed grain--STC.
Reproduction of the original in the Bodleian Library.
